languages.text: {n}Кассия удивленно моргает — вопрос явно застал ее врасплох.{/n} "Однажды регент подарил мне птицу с солнечной планеты. Я пыталась с ней подружиться и заставить петь, но она почему-то не хотела и быстро умерла. Наставники слишком уважали мой долг перед Домом, чтобы тратить драгоценное время на досужие разговоры. Помимо них на станции были лишь слуги, но им же вырезают голосовые связки, чтобы не нарушали обет безмолвия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия удивленно моргает — вопрос явно застал ее врасплох.{/n} "Однажды регент подарил мне птицу с солнечной планеты. Я пыталась с ней подружиться и заставить петь, но она почему-то не хотела и быстро умерла. Наставники слишком уважали мой долг перед Домом, чтобы тратить драгоценное время на досужие разговоры. Помимо них на станции были лишь слуги, но им же вырезают голосовые связки, чтобы не нарушали обет безмолвия".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia blinks in surprise, obviously taken aback by the question.{/n} "The regent gave me a bird from a sunlit planet once. I tried to befriend it and make it sing, but for some reason, it refused and died soon after. The instructors were too respectful of my duty to my House to waste precious time on idle chatter. Aside from them, there were only servants on the station, and you know they have their vocal cords removed so they cannot break their vow of silence."

Я пыталась с ней подружиться и заставить петь, но она почему-то не хотела и быстро умерла. Наставники слишком уважали мой долг перед Домом, чтобы тратить драгоценное время на досужие разговоры. Помимо них на станции были лишь слуги, но им же вырезают голосовые связки, чтобы не нарушали обет безмолвия".

I tried to befriend it and make it thing, but for some reason it refused to and perished quickly. The instructors were too respectful of my duty to the House to waste precious time on idle chatter. Aside from them, there were only servants at the station, and you know they have vocal chords removed so they cannot break the vow of silence."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅惊讶地眨了眨眼。你显然，你的问题让她惊讶不已。{/n}“摄政王曾给过我一只来自阳光行星的鸟。我本想和它交个朋友，让它唱歌，但出于某种原因，它不肯唱歌，随后不久就死了。那些导师极其重视我对家族的责任，他们从来不会将宝贵的时间浪费在闲聊上。除了他们之外，那座星站上就只有仆人了。如你所知，他们的声带都被切掉了，这样他们就不会违背沉默誓言。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia blinks in surprise, obviously taken aback by the question.{/n} "The regent gave me a bird from a sunlit planet once. I tried to befriend it and make it sing, but for some reason, it refused and died soon after. The instructors were too respectful of my duty to my House to waste precious time on idle chatter. Aside from them, there were only servants on the station, and you know they have their vocal cords removed so they cannot break their vow of silence."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅惊讶地眨了眨眼。你显然，你的问题让她惊讶不已。{/n}“摄政王曾给过我一只来自阳光行星的鸟。我本想和它交个朋友，让它唱歌，但出于某种原因，它不肯唱歌，随后不久就死了。那些导师极其重视我对家族的责任，他们从来不会将宝贵的时间浪费在闲聊上。除了他们之外，那座星站上就只有仆人了。如你所知，他们的声带都被切掉了，这样他们就不会违背沉默誓言。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia blinks in surprise, obviously taken aback by the question.{/n} "The regent gave me a bird from a sunlit planet once. I tried to befriend it and make it sing, but for some reason, it refused and died soon after. The instructors were too respectful of my duty to my House to waste precious time on idle chatter. Aside from them, there were only servants on the station, and you know they have their vocal cords removed so they cannot break their vow of silence."

languages.text: {n}Cassia parpadea, sorprendida por una pregunta inesperada.{/n} «El regente me dio un pájaro proveniente de un planeta soleado. Intenté hacerme amiga suya para que cantara, pero por lo que sea se negó y murió al poco tiempo. Los instructores sentían demasiado respeto por mis deberes hacia la casa como para perder tiempo en conversaciones informales. Aparte de ellos, solo había sirvientes en la estación y ya sabe que se les extirpan las cuerdas vocales para que no puedan romper su voto de silencio».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia blinks in surprise, obviously taken aback by the question.{/n} "The regent gave me a bird from a sunlit planet once. I tried to befriend it and make it sing, but for some reason, it refused and died soon after. The instructors were too respectful of my duty to my House to waste precious time on idle chatter. Aside from them, there were only servants on the station, and you know they have their vocal cords removed so they cannot break their vow of silence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia parpadea, sorprendida por una pregunta inesperada.{/n} «El regente me dio un pájaro proveniente de un planeta soleado. Intenté hacerme amiga suya para que cantara, pero por lo que sea se negó y murió al poco tiempo. Los instructores sentían demasiado respeto por mis deberes hacia la casa como para perder tiempo en conversaciones informales. Aparte de ellos, solo había sirvientes en la estación y ya sabe que se les extirpan las cuerdas vocales para que no puedan romper su voto de silencio».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは驚いて目を瞬かせた。その質問に驚いているのは明らかだった。{/n}「リージェントがある日、太陽に照らされた惑星の鳥をくれたことがございます。私はその鳥と仲良くなって歌わせようとしたのですが、なぜか拒否されてすぐに死んでしまいました。教官たちは、私の家に対する義務を尊重するあまり、たわいもないおしゃべりに貴重な時間を費やしていた。彼らの他には、僅かな使用人しかおりません。そして彼らは、声帯を切除されているので、沈黙の誓いを破ることはできないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia blinks in surprise, obviously taken aback by the question.{/n} "The regent gave me a bird from a sunlit planet once. I tried to befriend it and make it sing, but for some reason, it refused and died soon after. The instructors were too respectful of my duty to my House to waste precious time on idle chatter. Aside from them, there were only servants on the station, and you know they have their vocal cords removed so they cannot break their vow of silence."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは驚いて目を瞬かせた。その質問に驚いているのは明らかだった。{/n}「リージェントがある日、太陽に照らされた惑星の鳥をくれたことがございます。私はその鳥と仲良くなって歌わせようとしたのですが、なぜか拒否されてすぐに死んでしまいました。教官たちは、私の家に対する義務を尊重するあまり、たわいもないおしゃべりに貴重な時間を費やしていた。彼らの他には、僅かな使用人しかおりません。そして彼らは、声帯を切除されているので、沈黙の誓いを破ることはできないのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia blinzelt überrascht, offenbar erstaunt über die Frage.{/n} "Der Regent schenkte mir einmal einen Vogel von einem sonnenbeschienenen Planeten. Ich versuchte, mich mit ihm anzufreunden und ihn zum Singen zu bringen, doch er weigerte sich und starb bald darauf. Die Lehrer hatten zu großen Respekt vor meiner Pflicht meinem Haus gegenüber, um wertvolle Zeit mit sinnloser Plauderei zu vergeuden. Von ihnen abgesehen gab es nur Bedienstete auf der Station, und wie Ihr wisst, werden den Dienern die Stimmbänder entfernt, damit sie ihr Schweigegelübde nicht brechen können."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia blinks in surprise, obviously taken aback by the question.{/n} "The regent gave me a bird from a sunlit planet once. I tried to befriend it and make it sing, but for some reason, it refused and died soon after. The instructors were too respectful of my duty to my House to waste precious time on idle chatter. Aside from them, there were only servants on the station, and you know they have their vocal cords removed so they cannot break their vow of silence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia blinzelt überrascht, offenbar erstaunt über die Frage.{/n} "Der Regent schenkte mir einmal einen Vogel von einem sonnenbeschienenen Planeten. Ich versuchte, mich mit ihm anzufreunden und ihn zum Singen zu bringen, doch er weigerte sich und starb bald darauf. Die Lehrer hatten zu großen Respekt vor meiner Pflicht meinem Haus gegenüber, um wertvolle Zeit mit sinnloser Plauderei zu vergeuden. Von ihnen abgesehen gab es nur Bedienstete auf der Station, und wie Ihr wisst, werden den Dienern die Stimmbänder entfernt, damit sie ihr Schweigegelübde nicht brechen können."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia cille de surprise, visiblement déconcertée par votre question.{/n} « Une fois, le régent m'a offert un oiseau provenant d'une planète ensoleillée. J'ai voulu me lier d'amitié avec lui pour le faire chanter, mais pour une raison qui m'échappe, il a refusé et est mort peu de temps après. Les instructeurs avaient trop de respect envers mon devoir pour me faire perdre mon temps en discussions futiles. En dehors d'eux, il n'y avait que des serviteurs dans la station, et vous n'êtes pas sans savoir qu'on leur retire leurs cordes vocales pour qu'ils ne puissent pas rompre leur vœu de silence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia blinks in surprise, obviously taken aback by the question.{/n} "The regent gave me a bird from a sunlit planet once. I tried to befriend it and make it sing, but for some reason, it refused and died soon after. The instructors were too respectful of my duty to my House to waste precious time on idle chatter. Aside from them, there were only servants on the station, and you know they have their vocal cords removed so they cannot break their vow of silence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia cille de surprise, visiblement déconcertée par votre question.{/n} « Une fois, le régent m'a offert un oiseau provenant d'une planète ensoleillée. J'ai voulu me lier d'amitié avec lui pour le faire chanter, mais pour une raison qui m'échappe, il a refusé et est mort peu de temps après. Les instructeurs avaient trop de respect envers mon devoir pour me faire perdre mon temps en discussions futiles. En dehors d'eux, il n'y avait que des serviteurs dans la station, et vous n'êtes pas sans savoir qu'on leur retire leurs cordes vocales pour qu'ils ne puissent pas rompre leur vœu de silence. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia şaşkınlıkla göz kırpıyor. Soru karşısında kafasının karıştığı belli.{/n} "Bir keresinde naip, güneşle aydınlanan bir gezegenden kuş vermişti. Kuşla arkadaş olup şakımasını sağlamaya çalıştım ama nedense kuş oralı olmadı, çok geçmeden de öldü gitti. Eğitmenlerim, Haneme olan vazifeme fazlasıyla saygılı olduğundan kıymetli vaktimi boş sohbetle harcamazlardı. Eğitmenlerim dışında da istasyonda sadece hizmetkârlar vardı ve bildiğin üzere, ettikleri sessizlik yeminini bozmamasınlar diye onların da ses telleri sökülür."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia blinks in surprise, obviously taken aback by the question.{/n} "The regent gave me a bird from a sunlit planet once. I tried to befriend it and make it sing, but for some reason, it refused and died soon after. The instructors were too respectful of my duty to my House to waste precious time on idle chatter. Aside from them, there were only servants on the station, and you know they have their vocal cords removed so they cannot break their vow of silence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia şaşkınlıkla göz kırpıyor. Sorduğun sorudan kafasının karıştığı belli oluyor.{/n} "Bir keresinde naip, gün yüzü gören bir gezegenden aldığı bir kuşu vermişti bana. Kuşla arkadaş olup şakımasını sağlamaya çalıştım ama nedense kuş bunu istemedi, çok geçmeden de öldü gitti. Eğitmenlerim, Haneme olan vazifeme fazlasıyla saygılıydı; bu yüzden de kıymetli vaktimi boş sohbetle harcamazlardı. Eğitmenlerim dışında da istasyonda sadece hizmetkârlar vardı ve bildiğin üzere, ettikleri sessizlik yeminini bozmamaları için hizmetkârların ses telleri sökülür."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
